page.title: 13A THELWALL CHILD'S DAY
page.content:
{ A Day In The Life of Emma Woods (A Thelwall child age 11)
At 7am I wake up and read until 7.30. After breakfast I get dressed and ready for school. I go and call for my friends, arriving at school at 9.00.
We have assembly at 9.30 then Geography. At 10.30 we go out to play. After play it is maths until dinner. In the afternoon it is games followed by puzzles off the blackboard. At 3.45 it is hometime.
At 4.00 I go swimming. I have my tea at 6.00 and then play out until 8.15. Then I take the dog for a walk.
At 8.30 I go in for bath then at 9.30pm I go to bed.
